patthana23.11:4.1: Nakusalaṃ naparittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.11:4.3: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana23.11:5.1: Nakusalaṃ namahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.11:6.1: Nakusalaṃ naappamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.11:6.3: Hetuyā cha … pe … āsevane tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
